name: Forza Horizon 5: European Automotive Car Pack
summary: The European Automotive Car Pack showcases some of the best work of car manufacturers from Across the Atlantic. It includes the 1987 Mercedes-Benz AMG Hammer Wagon, 2021 Bentley Continental GT Convertible, 2020 Automobili Pininfarina Battista, and the 2019 Jaguar XE SV Project 8.
